timeline.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText: Sorry for wrong idea, fixed key is incorrect here, since a method may have more than one consumer call with sync or async. I'm agree with adding the Sentinel prefix for identification.
replies.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText:
As both SentinelDubboProviderFilter and SentinelDubboConsumerFilter share this method,  DubboConfig.getDubboConsumerPrefix() may not correct, when providerPrefix, consumerPrefix have different settings.
If use methodResourceName as key, here we may need to differentiate provider and consumer.
timeline.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText: emm.. I don't notice this. I will modify it later.
replies.author: linlinisme

timeline.message: [1416] BaseSentinelDubboFilter add getMethodName() and getInterfaceName() method

timeline.bodyText: This may cause leak of interfaceEntry when the methodEntry is blocked. Refer #1124 (comment)
timeline.author: sczyh30

replies.bodyText: +1, when methodEntry is blocked, the rpcContext#set can't be executed, and the value in rpcContext with key of methodResourceName is null. We may need to keep the same as the previous commit, use two different key separately.
replies.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText:
It's better to keep only one blank line here.
Also Line#78,Line#80.
Line#104 can be removed for better and uniform formatting.
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.message: [1416] BaseSentinelDubboFilter add getMethodName() and getInterfaceName() method

timeline.bodyText: How about using Deque instead to avoid bad performance? Stack is derived from Vector, whose operations are wrapped with synchronized.
timeline.author: sczyh30

replies.bodyText: Oh why not using final here? Any performance related reason?
replies.author: jasonjoo2010

replies.bodyText: final can improve the performance highly?
replies.author: Lin-Liang

replies.bodyText:
final can improve the performance highly?

Not really.
Talk to performance in time efficiency i should say there isn't obvious difference. It's a suggestion aiming:

No extra data structure was introduced.
Look simpler
Implicit reference was introduced for Stack or Dequeue compared to final. They are similar in this view.
replies.author: jasonjoo2010

timeline.message:
[1416] replace Stack with LinkedList for improve performance

[1416] replace Stack with LinkedList for improve performance
